lender.name: Amber
lender.occupational_info: Nursing student

lender.name: Randa
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all do our little part to help others who are less fortunate. It is my dream to be able to do way more one day.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find homes.

lender.name: K. Lin
lender.loan_because: I have an earnest desire to give back and contribute to the cycle of philanthropy. Without the help of microfinance, my parents would not have been able to emigrate to the United States and build the life our family has today.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone directly

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want people all over the world to succeed. We are all sisters and brothers.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher. Now I take photographs of beautiful people and places.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: My work is centered around creating sustainable solutions that will meet the worlds increasing demand for feed, food & fuel.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva awhile ago, but just started to get involved. I think it's a pretty cool program and I'm excited to be part of something that helps people all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with hospitals setting up their records and computer systems. Not a bad living, it's part of helping and adding value to the lives of the people I work with.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard-working people make a better life for themselves, and I think micro-finance is an effective way to reduce poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I grew up overseas and am currently working in Iraq.

lender.name: HomeZirk
lender.occupational_info: Save money by selling a home yourself. Do it best with video and expert help.

lender.name: Dr. Danette M. Vercher
lender.loan_because: No child should be left behind. Thank you in advance for your loans.
lender.occupational_info: These children have no support system in there country. As a Foster/Surrogate parent in the states and meeting the needs of our orphans, I have been given the dynamic task of reaching out to the orphans of Kitale/Kenya. I founded "A Ray of Hope Center Orphanage" through "A Ray of Hope Ministries Christian Center" a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.

lender.name: Jonathan Eastabrooks
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have more than I require and feel it a duty to assist those in need. I don't do it because of religion, guilt, or even status...I do it because it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Amnistía Internacional
lender.occupational_info: Trabajamos para derefender los derechos humanos

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: it gives me pleasure to help others help themself, their family.. using their own ideas & abilities to improve life & community.
lender.occupational_info: listening, indentifying, responding to the requests, needs, questions of peoples worldwide hoping or doing business with the company I work for.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who don't have all the things we do.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: To help people rebuild their lives and communities after conflicts.
lender.occupational_info: accounting and financial work...but i do photography on the side

lender.name: Terrie
lender.loan_because: my mission is to promote harmony & prosperity on Earth by inspiring individuals to create holistic, balanced & empowered lives. Giving through Kiva is a great way to support others in that!
lender.occupational_info: I design, develop and market businesses on the Internet.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a scientist, so I can invent medicine, test it on people and see if they die (or not).

lender.name: Gerhard
lender.loan_because: it's a lot better than just donating

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others obtain some of the advantages I have.
lender.occupational_info: PhD student in computer science.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their right for a good life

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: Hello ! Kiva is very important for me because it is a great means to do positive public useful deed . Oliver Bochum
lender.occupational_info: I,m working in hospital on a ward with adict people . It is a thearapeutic work . My second job is in the museums in the surounding area as a childre-nart- educator.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: When I retired, my collegues in the customer service department of Alcoa Mill Product, Lancaster, Pa. gave me a monetary gift with the thought that I could donate the money to a favorite charity. My brother told me about Kiva and it seemed like a good way for the group to see how their money was working to help others.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: To be able to give, is a gift.

lender.name: Yalixa
lender.loan_because: giving is great!

lender.name: Rande
lender.loan_because: I LOVE this idea!!!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work with foster children in a rural community of California.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it enables people to make the world a better place and it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sussex Leo Club
lender.occupation: Youth Group of Sussex Lions organization
lender.loan_because: We serve others.
lender.occupational_info: We're a youth group sponsored by Sussex Lions club. We raise funds to help others, both locally and around the world.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I am blessed living in Canada and I do believe that it is our responsibility to help out each other.I am so happy to be able to give to women. We are all sisters together.
lender.occupational_info: I do not work outside the home. However I do spend much time with my darling grandchildren. No better way to be busy.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: it is a way to give to those who just need a little to make it a long way. I believe these loans can make a true difference in someone's life...

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: We only get one chance at life and I want to make it a good one.
lender.occupational_info: Fun!

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help give others the same opportunities I have had

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: We should all look out for one another.
lender.occupational_info: I tell the glowing box what to display.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help others affect positive change in their communities, especially women.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: it's part of my faith life to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an engineer who works on airplanes and spacecraft

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: I'm a recent graduate of the University of Florida. I studied Environmental Science Policy, Soil and Water Science, and Sustainability Studies. I'm now pursuing a law degree from George Washington University in Washington, DC.

lender.name: John and Kristin
lender.loan_because: It's good stewardship of the resources God has entrusted us with.

lender.name: Cliff
lender.occupational_info: Youth Pastor

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: We all have the power to make a difference in the world. I believe that if it is within our power to make a positive difference in someone's life, there is no good reason not to. Also, loaning through kiva is a good way to feel more connected to the global community.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I am an artist. I feel a constant need to create new and beautiful and exciting things. I like to be provocative and controversial, and express things that can only be communicated through a canvas.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: we could all use a hand sometimes.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: I am a web developer for an ecommerce company.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea and KIVA makes it easy to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am director of a public library district in northern Idaho (USA) about 70 miles south of the British Columbia (Canada) border. The district serves a population of 32,000 people from two branch libraries and a bookmobile. These libraries are heavily used and rank 6th in materials checked out and 7th in patron visits among approximately 140 public libraries within the state. See the library web page @ http://www.ebcl.lib.id.us/ebcl/ .

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: my parents, friends and community have given me so much that this is just another way that I can try to give someone else a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Hetal
lender.loan_because: A minuscule effort on my part helps someone else make a huge impact on theirs.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I care about poverty

lender.name: Christian Linhart
lender.loan_because: I am a startup entrepreneur myself and I want to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info:
I have a full-time employee job where I work as a software engineer, that is I write software programs, which in this case are used in command and control centers for fire-fighters, ambulance, ...
Besides this job, I start up a business where I create and sell my own software product DemoRecorder which is a screen recorder for Linux.

lender.name: Sask Kiva
lender.loan_because: People deserve the opportunity to grow.
lender.occupational_info: Learning and Education

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: I enjoy creating websites and generating some income. I now want that income to do some good.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time strategy manager in a gas and electrcity company in the UK. In my spare time I run a few websites. We are using the revenue from the advertisements placed on one of our websites - EnergyBook (free and green worldwide marketplace) to fund our loans through Kiva.

lender.name: Rodney
lender.loan_because: I believe in the local economy and will give them hope with starting up there own company's. Sure i will see the succes of the business. But it's always that you need something before you can make something

lender.name: sam
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the circuit board industry. I own and manage the business along with my brother.

lender.name: Jeroen
lender.loan_because: It's simple and simple things can make a big difference

lender.name: Tali
lender.loan_because: i feel blessed

lender.name: dave
lender.loan_because: i do not have my own house. I want to give my a family a safe home and place to live with.
lender.occupational_info: business process outsource

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to feel connected to people doing good work around the world.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate at my retirement
lender.occupational_info: Retired Builder

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help people live their dream.
lender.occupational_info: Criminal investigator with the Swedish Police

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I can, it helps, nothing and no one is without intrinsic value.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am a successful woman business owner and I like to support other women business owners at whatever level I can.
lender.occupational_info: I do home repair and remodeling in Boise, Idaho.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves - people have the amazing ideas but they need capital for these to reach fruition.
lender.occupational_info: Broadcast and web service developer.

lender.name: Giovanni
lender.loan_because: better to light a candle than to curse the darkness
lender.occupational_info: moneylending

lender.name: Murphy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for people who need it.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: i believe in people helping people without government involvment. the whole teach a man to fish thing.
lender.occupational_info: i buy items for a store to resell.

lender.name: Guillem
lender.loan_because: it helps

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference in peoples' lives. We are all connected by our common humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college teacher, artist, and writer.

lender.name: Armand
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance is a great idea to help poor or vulnerable farmers, who cannot lend at an official bank. I learned this, when I was helping a Vietnamese Ph. D. student at the university of Antwerp. Now in 2010 already 2 students got their Ph. D. I will help a third one. Unfortunally enough KIVA is not active in the Mekong Delta. So I started to help people from other countries.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Small loans to individuals makes sense to me as a way to help people out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Plan a Christian Leadership conference. Work on speaker selection and the content of their talks.

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I believe it's more beneficial to give someone a hand-up than a hand out.

lender.name: StephenUhl
lender.loan_because: I want entrepreneurs to help themselves help their neighbors without forwarding religious superstitions.
lender.occupational_info: Reasoned and friendly efforts to help people come out of God's musty closet into the sunlight of personal freedom and self-responsibility. That's why I wrote the book, Out of God's Closet: This Priest Psychologist Chooses Friendly Atheism.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I'm a human.

lender.name: Gabi
lender.loan_because: My god mother thought this would be better than a new Tickle-Me-Elmo
lender.occupational_info: Playing dress up with my sister, my pink PJ's, snuggling with mommy, daddy and the friends.

lender.name: Madison
lender.loan_because: I am loved and well taken care of by my family and I want the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am cute, and lovable and bring lots of joy to my family.

lender.name: Samela
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others improve their lives.

lender.name: Eloise
lender.loan_because: Recycling funds is a way to share some of my own gracious plenty with the world which is, I think, the defintion of prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I write mystery novels based out of my experience working as a psychic. I'm also a nurse and have worked most recently in the area of alternative health.

lender.name: Frederick
lender.loan_because: I just lost a substantial portion of my income. Though I'm still able to pay my bills I'm now is situation where my discretionary income is largely gone. Becoming involved with Kiva helped me to realize that my financial situation is really not all that important. I’ve resolved to give a $25.00 donation from each pay check and, as my income expands, will increase this amount. My ultimate goal is to establish a war chest of $5,000 that I can use to help others with.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an administrator in a hospital

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: It's a practical, easy, effective, reliable way to make a difference in peoples' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I build the computer systems that make web sites like Kiva work

lender.name: THE george
lender.whereabouts: Raleigh via East LA North Carolina
lender.loan_because: I am much more fortunate than I should be and I am doing nothing more than sharing my good luck
lender.occupational_info: i do things.... not much i promise

lender.name: Maria & Drew
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to thank everyone who came to support us on our wedding day. Thank you so much for being a part of our lives. Because of you, we are able, in this small way, to be a part of others' lives.
lender.occupational_info: Maria & Drew are getting married on September 5, 2009.

lender.name: Brahm
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as in-house counsel for a global consumer products company. The majority of my work responsibilities involve drafting complex intellectual property (patents, trademarks, trade secrets, copyrights) license agreements. Outside of work, I volunteer my time as a director, acting coach and website designer / webmaster for a young performers (ages 5-18) community theatre group.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Investing in entrepreneurs creates far more value in the world than buying a useless gadget for myself.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a desk all day typing into a computer.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.occupational_info: Develop more efficient solar energy collectors using algae.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: our "leaders" are not doing enough to promote fair trade and address the gap in income.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving. I have great respect for those who have the courage to pursue their dreams and are willing to work hard to achieve them.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to have an excellent education that allows me to work to support myself. I also am very fortunate to have the support of my family. My health is not good and I know if I am ever in need my family will be there to help me. I want to be there for someone else less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Why not? It's fun.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: having lived in a small village in Mali for 2+ years I know first hand what a difference a small amount of money can mean to someone who is willing to work hard to make a better future for oneself and one's community. Oh, and because my wonderful parents taught me that to give and help others is why we were put on this Earth.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of international development with a focus on agricultural development and natural resources management.

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to help make a small difference for others.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Most of my work relates to book publishing and photography.

lender.name: James & Audrey
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are commited to helping our brothers and sister around the world to overcome poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Educator and Bookkeeper

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to have the ability.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make the news more accessible.

lender.name: Eran & Ashley
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Terrie
lender.loan_because: It is one thing I can do to assist another in increasing the joy of humanity

lender.name: PhilTamEthanKateLaura
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves. We want to teach our kids that giving and participating is a better than simply receiving
lender.occupational_info: Phillip is a financial planner who helps people take charge of their money and invest it wisely for the the future. Tammy is a lawyer but presently is at home full time with our three beautiful children Ethan (5) Kate (3) and Laura (18 months)

lender.name: David j
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people and do not like to see people with out the basic necessities in life we all need a little help from our friends!
lender.occupational_info: my work is of all sorts of different wood carvings in wood mainly architectural woodcarvings

lender.name: Rahul
lender.occupational_info: I look at data and use statistical techniques to figure out what it means.

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: I study applied math and fluid dynamics.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: we should help out each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help clients who have addictions who are in rehabilitation.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian with a big heart and a love for my fellow man. I am a firm believer in helping individuals with the drive and determination to make a better world for their family members and the world around them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mechanic in a truck shop in the midwestern United States.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I live in a country of abundance, and I want to help others get a leg up.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: My son, Andrew, is the Summer 2009 Kiva volunteer in Cotonou, Benin. Hi Andrew.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help people build businesses, cash flow and assets.
lender.occupational_info: I use my resources throughout the world to find business opportunities. I help people make their business ideas a reality.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to enable others to make a living and feel empowered.
lender.occupational_info: I sell electronics products that go in all sorts of everyday devices.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: it's a simple way to help people who are need. There shouldn't be any ifs, ands or buts about lending to those who need help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an electronics store, but my ultimate goal is to work for a charity or a non-profit improving peoples lives.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can certainly afford to help, and I can't find a single reason I shouldn't help.
lender.occupational_info: I study physics--the science of the smallest and the largest things in the universe--and I hope to teach physics to young people as soon as I can.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: it seemed like a good idea.

lender.name: Abhi, Davina & Jonah
lender.loan_because: Helping others is a way to find happiness.

lender.name: Eugene
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of micro-loans changing lives for the better

lender.name: Raul
lender.loan_because: It is great to help, even if it is just a grain of sand...

lender.name: Patrik
lender.occupational_info: present on swiss public radio technological and scientific developments from all around the world, preferably the ones that help make the world a better place, but unfortunately that's not always the case.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it's such a great way to help people

lender.name: 16th Summer
lender.loan_because: we can! できるから！
lender.occupational_info: Every summer for the last 16 years, this group of friends have gathered for a bbq, so we decided to name ourselves after this fact. (In case you are wondering why there are only 12 figures in our avatar, it's because 12 of us contributed to our first loan!) ここ１６年間毎年夏に集まっている仲間なので、それを名前にすることにしました。（絵に何故１２人しかいないと不思議に思っている方へ：最初の融資先に貢献した人数です！）

lender.name: Annalisa
lender.loan_because: I need loan to sustain for my ongoing chemo

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have written two theses on microfinance, so I know it works. Now I can put in into practice!
lender.occupational_info: I work as an advisor/ consultant and give economic advise on infrastructure and water projects. Examples are highways but also water management like Green Roofs. I also work with migrants, temporary housing projects, and other big city/ neighbourhood projects.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that every human being wants to be a self-sufficient, contributing member of the global society. It's at the grassroots level that true change occurs. I am investing in this future.

lender.name: Heike
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Charlotte & Griffin
lender.loan_because: we want to help people become independant and self-sufficient without imposing religious messages.
lender.occupational_info: Charlotte is studying towards becoming a Translator and Griffin does a variety of work including construction, chef work and IT engineering.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I feel that lending to someone helps them to have self confidence and keeps them feeling that they are helping themselves rather than just been given something.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Bookkeeper and admin for salvation army Hostel for homeless men

lender.name: Vicente
lender.loan_because: Jesuchrist has made my life, one full of love, and I would like to spread it. Kiva gives me an opportunity to do so.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I believe I should try to live in a way that benefits others
lender.occupational_info: I record voice-overs for corporate, commercial and public service clients.

lender.name: Taras
lender.loan_because: My present work does not satisfy me. I consider its boring. Therefore I wish to open own business
lender.occupational_info: My hobby - music and organisation of parties. I wish to open own business on the organisation and carrying out of various actions: banquets, weddings etc.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are less fortunate. Each person's wealth is simply by the grace of God and not one's own doing.
lender.occupational_info: Sharing God's money with people who are less fortunate. Trying to set a good example of Christian love.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because:
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
-- Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: Little loans can make a big difference!
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Sales

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: Because of the immoral corporatocracy that exploits billions of people and resources worldwide for shortsighted profits.
lender.occupational_info: I work in search engine marketing for myself and for a company so fully comprehend the power of the internet.

lender.name: Tatiana
lender.loan_because: To have the ability to provide a stepping stone so others can reach their full potential - and ultimatly be proud of their own accomplishment - is a powerful and humbling way to engage....

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I love the courage and the commitment!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a coach

lender.name: Ruthanne
lender.loan_because: As the Grandmother of the child in my picture I am trying to teacher her that helping others can provide more personal happiness than just helping yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate supply and service contracts in the oil and gas sector. My job is to ensure the company I work for is protected while making sure that the company operates in a fair and consistent manner with it's suppliers.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: my MS puts physical activity out of my reach - but I can still earn a living, and I want to do what I still can to help others.

lender.name: Pothi
lender.loan_because: I got all money from this world. It's time to give something back to less privileged people.
lender.occupational_info: WordPress Performance Optimizer and Security Consultant!

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: Kiva has done a great job of identifying people who deserve a chance. I'm happy to be able to be a part of it.

lender.name: Socially Inept
lender.loan_because: the way of Jesus is through community. Community means sharing resources so that everyone has what they need. We try to share with each other and with those who have a need.
lender.occupational_info: We gather together to eat and be in community.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I can. I have been helped the past, and I want to pay it forward. It's a foundation of my beliefs.
lender.occupational_info: Sharing sustainable agriculture and intelligent use of the earth's resources.

lender.name: waeld
lender.occupational_info: عملى ممتع لاقصى درجه ولكن سوء الادارة من قبل امدير التنفيذى جعلنى اكره العمل رغم ما اقدمه من مساعدات وخدمات للمحتاجين وكم اكون سعيدا وانا استطيع مد يد العون للمحتاج ولكن مركزية الادارة وحب النفوز والسيطره جعلنى افكر فى الاستقلال والبحث عن بديل لمساعدة الغير دو ان اتسبب فى ايذاء احد وان اطبق ماتعلمته خلال زيارتى لامريكا ضمن برنامج الزائر الدولى

lender.name: Ted & Susan
lender.loan_because: We want for our friends to be successful and to create a peace filled and healthy planet.
lender.occupational_info: Directors of Non-Profit Education and Volunteer Tourism organisation.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Help people set up and maintain their computers and small networks for their home and small business.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I like mice.
lender.occupational_info: Mice are awesome.

lender.name: J.E.M.S. Tutoring
lender.loan_because: Money is not in need where we are, so it can be used as needed elsewhere.
lender.occupational_info: J.E.M.S. Tutoring is a nonprofit organization that tutors students from K-12 all the way through College courses across California. The organization is controlled by undergraduate and graduate students that have been blessed with the opportunity of a College education. All proceeds are dedicated to international donation to help people across the globe.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: There is no more heart warming investment on the planet than helping other people achieve their hopes and dreams. Every time I open my KIVA profile I smile at the photos of "my people" and envision them at work in their towns and villages, selling bags of rice, milking cows, sweeping their shops, repairing their homes, feeding their children, and I feel enriched by my tiny stake in their lives.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We wish you all the best in your business. You are very smart and brave. Keep up the good work!

lender.name: Naveed
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Behzad
lender.loan_because: I have some much and others have so little.
lender.occupational_info: public defender

lender.name: Puneet
lender.loan_because: I just feel I have to give back, have to. I don't know why and I don't want to know.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance. Everyone always says that they would help others more if they had the money...Kiva lets me make a difference on what I already have to offer.
lender.occupational_info: I help potential parents in the US, prepare to have a family. Many of the people who adopt have never had children but have wanted them all their lives. I have 5 of my own and 4 grandchildren. I am so happy to help create families for others!

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: Everything, everywhere, all at once, all the time... works out more perfectly than we may possibly imagine.
lender.occupational_info: I manage over 110 employees toward the effort of feeding people in a way that they will always remember. Feeding people is one of the most noble professions in the world.

lender.name: Nicolas Frichot
lender.loan_because: try to help!
lender.occupational_info:
J'ai déjà fait plus de 20 métiers différents et ce n'est pas fini...
Already made more than 20 differents jobs and it's always go on...

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Because if we don't, who will?

lender.name: Craig
lender.occupational_info: I help support the education of children age 5 through 18 in our public schools. For example, I advocate for better funding for our schools.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in the opportunities I have been given and would like to allow others similar opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Retired - in training

lender.name: Matt & Heather
lender.loan_because: partnering with people across the world to meet real needs demonstrates God's love.
lender.occupational_info:
Matt is a student at Dallas Theological Seminary and a part-time pastor. He works with teams at his church to welcome guests and help people connect with one another.
Heather works in marketing within the hotel industry.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I'm not a big "things" person. Why not lend that money to someone who will use it?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a junior in college, and I have a part-time job as an English tutor.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: it's good for everyone
lender.occupational_info: I am an executive in the telecommunications industry that specializes in mobile applications

lender.name: Ann
lender.occupation: Librarian, and general spreader of the word

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: This method has been shown to be a highly effective way to empower people and change communities for the better. Thank you Kiva for coming up with such a wonderful interface!
lender.occupational_info: I do basic biology research with the long-term goal of finding ways to re-engineer cyanobacteria (photosynthesizing bacteria) to produce biofuels.

lender.name: yasmin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of women throughout the world especially in Africa where men hold what little power and resources available.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital in a urban area. I really enjoy my job; taking care of people, and making a difference in their health.

lender.name: Carsen
lender.loan_because: I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student beginning my first year of college in the fall

lender.name: Tinh
lender.occupational_info: Kiva coordinator for Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women and I am also responsible for finding and connecting donors and partners for thê Fund.

lender.name: Erwin
lender.loan_because: If a small amount to me makes a difference to others, I will gladly help. My best wishes to those who receive the loans!
lender.occupational_info: I enhance and maintain internet websites, selling products in them.

lender.name: Satsuki
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Keeping busy.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It works!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying French and Economics at Pomona College in sunny Claremont, California.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I am blessed by God.
lender.occupational_info: Make a small positive mark on people's lives

lender.name: John
lender.occupation: US Air Force Officer and Entrepreneur

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: giving is fun.
lender.occupational_info: i run a bookstore/art store.

lender.name: mariel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very rewarding, less stress, because I'm just working at home. More time to myself and family.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I love supporting entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I help others buy and sell real estate.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: to empower female entrepreneurs to attain financial self-sufficiency for themselves and for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate health supports and services for children with disabilities in foster care from New York City.

lender.name: Joan
lender.occupation: artisan jewelry & seller of jewelry supplies
lender.loan_because: Small business has made an enormous difference in my life. My wish is that small business will make an enormous difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell artisan jewelry supplies and make artisan jewelry.

lender.name: Nayla
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a biology college student in Puerto Rico.

lender.name: emberly
lender.loan_because: God has given me soo much-I have to share with others!

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: It is an efficient and direct way to people who really need help, use a small amount money to contribute others' life, to make someone can live by their own, and in the end they repaid you back.
lender.occupational_info: As a consultant of customer/partner/employee relationship management.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough not to need a loan - but if I did this is how I would want to helped
lender.occupational_info: I run the UK part of a big IT company. I am lucky to live in the UK and I am lucky to work in a growing industry. Not everyone is that lucky

lender.name: Gav
lender.loan_because: I know how much difference a little help can make

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very good way to help people who has entuthiasm and idea and want to be independent. I also like the quick way KIVA seames to handle the transaktions.

lender.name: Pieter
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Cathrine
lender.loan_because: I believe in the impact of small things. You CAN change the world
lender.occupational_info: I work in Statistics Norway (statistics) and Klokkergården (with drug addicts).

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: Humanitarian worker

lender.name: Lisl
lender.loan_because: even small gestures can make the world a better place. I have therefore I share.

lender.name: PARTHIBAN.S
lender.loan_because: Dedication is delight, the delight of the heart. When we dedicate ourselves to someone, our very dedication expands our consciousness, and we feel that our inseparable oneness with God is something real and fulfilling.
lender.occupational_info: Dedication. It has the key to open God's Palace.
